dmca.title: abuse of our website
dmca.body:
Nc


-----Original Message-----
From: The Rosemary Co/4Showers.Com [mailto:rosemaryjc@comcast.net] 
Sent: Monday, January 24, 2005 9:54 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: abuse of our website

I am the President of The Rosemary Company
http://www.rosemarycompany.com
We have recently discovered that a company using your hosting services
has duplicated our website for reasons unknown to us and unauthorized by
us.  The fraudulent URL is:
pastime99.com http://www.pastime99.com
As you will see, it is an exact duplicate of our website although they
have plagiarized everything, including our copyrights.  This appears to
be a sophisticated scam, probably to sell advertising on a pay per click
basis, however, it also leaves our customers vulnerable to theft.  If
customers were to contact the listed address on the bogus website and
provide credit card information for the purpose of purchasing the items
listed on that website, there is no doubt that they would victimized.
It is my understanding that you provide this company with a dedicated
server.  That means that they are probably using this server to
victimize other companies in addition to ours.  This may be a new type
of internet fraud, but it appears to have been going on with our company
for about a year.  We have reason to believe that you are not the only
company they are using for this fraud, as another URL is also in
existance that has duplicated our site.  It is being hosted by another
company.

I have spoken with the FBI and they are extremely interested in this
scheme and this company.  I'm sure they will be in contact with you
soon.  It would be advantageous if you would have removed this company
as a customer prior to that time.  You may contact me at:
info@rosemarycompany.com or through our toll free number of (800)
8233891.  Both our e-mail address, and phone number are listed on our
legitimate website, together with our mailing address.  I am also faxing
this information to your desigated agent Lance Crosby, Esq.  Chief
Operating Officer
I hope to be hearing from you soon.
Thank you.

Judith A Cheney
President
The Rosemary Company
http://www.rosemarycompany.com



-- 
No virus found in this outgoing message.
Checked by AVG Anti-Virus.
Version: 7.0.300 / Virus Database: 265.7.2 - Release Date: 1/21/2005
